page.title: 17THE CHURCH IN ABERNYTE
page.content: Abernyte Church is a small church.It has a single bell which is rung every Sunday at 11.00 for weekly services.It has 2 beautiful stained glass windows. The church is in a cross shape and has 40 numbered pews.There is an organ & a harmonium in case of power cuts.There are two small grave yards with graves as old as 1721.An interesting grave is that of Rev.W.Ross,a poor servant from Abernyte who became a missionary.He went Central S.Africa.Work he did is recorded on his tomb-stone.The Manse beside the church was sold in 1985.The last part-time minister lived in it in 1981.The present minister lives in Longforgan and administers Abernyte, Inchture & Kinniard parishes as well as Longforgan.A part-time minister helps him.It is a Church of Scotland.
